message01.message: make sure that your whole body is covered when you are held up by a fanatic checkpoint

message02.message: never wear military clothing when you are approached by fanatics

message05.message: Be sure to dress up completely in military clothing when you are approached by marxists

message06.message: your hair must be covered when you are approached by rebel soldiers

message08.message: you do not need to cover your eyes when you are approached by rebels
